replies.body: Jihn Still not on the oce, they still wanna put skins first phfhfhfhfh

Hey man, Jhin isn't out in any region yet. Check out the patch notes - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-62-notes

"Jhin, the Virtuoso, will be released the week after patch 6.2's launch! To learn more, check the following links"
Could we have more "good looking" champ? Unlike those new champ we have these time
r we talking {{champion:126}} good looking or {{champion:103}}  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) good looking

disagree! I find him very aesthetically pleasing, maybe it is your tastes that need to expand. 
What don't you like about the art?
thats crazy cool. good job. love it.{{champion:432}}
love everything u have done and i rekon this champ is going to be really fun well done riot <3
hmmm... taste for Opera... Killers... and the Mask gives that Feeling of V for Vendetta, S for Sniper xD
jhin legit is almost as ugly as urgot, like what is that hump on his shoulder, his legs look like strands of sphagetti and everything is out of proportion. Seriously could of been way cooler.
And the way he walks.
Dude has some serious swagger.

riot have spent alot of time working towards this very hyped up champion they don't want ruined by people who don't know anything about what goes into making a game character, yet think they can do it better

I run by 1 rule only on forums: only complain if you can do it better. (eg if your not a top s**t animator, coder and artwork designer... you shouldn't be whining about jhin)

did i complain about the animations, no did i complain about the coding no did i complain about the artwork yes. Maybe riot should run a hype train for 2 decades and then reveal something that looks like an anorexic bard.
please riot do this.^^^ i skinny bard op

Your argument makes no sense, does that mean only pros can be commentators? Only chefs can be taste testers?

 Do I need a degree to have an opinion?
Man I can't wait to buy this champion when he comes out. Hopefully, he's lore will be good since I'm more of a lore person.{{champion:202}}
Jhin looks like he is from Bloodborne
love how this echoes the Phantom of the Opera, so damn good!

I love the way this champion interacts with the current selection of champs and the long ranges its awesome but also in saying that i kinda think instead of making new champions atm maybe reworking current champions we have (eg: urgot, taric ect) and making them playable once again and dont think this is me not wanting new content or anything like that but reworking new champions is like new content you know its just something iv been thinking about for a while

Taric update is on it's way :D. Should be out before the next champion release. Also, the guys who work on new champs are separate from the guys that work on updating older stuff, so working on new stuff doesn't slow down old stuff.
people say who is the last deadeye?
yes
